rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0001
rows.name: This is the place.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0002
rows.name:
Welcome!
Searching for something in particular?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, I'm looking for historical texts
and ancient documents. I heard you
received some recently.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0004
rows.name: You're quite well-informed, customer!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0005
rows.name:
We've received many unique books
that you won't find elsewhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0006
rows.name: Really? You're getting my hopes up!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0007
rows.name:
Take your time looking. I'm
sure you'll find something satisfying!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0008
rows.name:
Of course, that's what I intend to do.
Now, let's see, the selection is...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0009
rows.name:
Huh, not just books,
but also stone tablets and scrolls too.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0010
rows.name:
Ah, what's this!
A history of Superbian architecture?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0011
rows.name:
They even have something like this.
Nice, this looks interesting.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, Pelala,
did you get what I ordered?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0014
rows.name:
Well well, thank you for
your regular patronage.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0015
rows.name:
It came in stock recently,
...let's see.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0016
rows.name:
Ah, there it is! That book the
young lady over there is holding.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0017
rows.name: Hm?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0018
rows.name: ...Excuse me, you there.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0019
rows.name:
That's the book I've been searching for.
Kindly hand it over.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0020
rows.name:
What? Sorry...
I was planning to read this myself...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0021
rows.name:
I apologize, but
but I ordered that first.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0022
rows.name: Hand it over now.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0023
rows.name:
I refuse.
I was the first to get my hands on it.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0024
rows.name:
How dense are you?
I'm telling you it belongs to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0025
rows.name: Who exactly are you calling dense?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0026
rows.name:
Are you aware of who you're addressing
with such disrespect?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0027
rows.name:
I neither know nor care
who you might be.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0028
rows.name: Just hurry up and hand over the book!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0029
rows.name:
Geez, what a stubborn Nopon.
Alright, I'll let you have the book.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0030
rows.name:
Finally! That's what you
should have done from the start...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0031
rows.name:
But wait!
That is, only if you can defeat me
in a contest of knowledge!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0032
rows.name:
Hmm...
So you wish to challenge my intellect?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0033
rows.name:
How amusing...
I'll turn the tables on you!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0101
rows.name: Well then, what subject shall we select?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0102
rows.name:
To ensure impartiality, let's ask that
Driver over there to choose our topic.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0034
rows.name: What would be a good topic?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0035
rows.name: How about the history of Avaritia?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0036
rows.name: How about the history of Invidia?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0103
rows.name: What would be a good topic?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0104
rows.name: The history of Avaritia, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0105
rows.name: The history of Invidia, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0106
rows.name: What would be a good topic?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0107
rows.name: The history of Avaritia, perhaps?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0108
rows.name: The history of Invidia, perhaps?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0109
rows.name: What would be a good topic?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0110
rows.name: The history of Avaritia, I reckon.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0111
rows.name: The history of Invidia, I reckon.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0201
rows.name:
Excellent choice!
Shall we begin?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0037
rows.name:
Avaritia was reportedly founded by
a Nopon merchant...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0038
rows.name:
Naturally, that's common knowledge.
And what's more, that Nopon was a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0039
rows.name: So, about that Nopon Driver...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0040
rows.name:
Are you aware that he utilized
his Blade not for combat,
but for commercial endeavors?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0041
rows.name:
In the turbulent war period,
he maximized his Blade's capabilities...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0042
rows.name:
He go to crisis areas affected by
strife or disaster, and form trading
links where none exist. Very profitable.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0043
rows.name: Additionally, this Nopon...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0044
rows.name:
Is reportedly a descendant of
the legendary Captain Nopopon...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0045
rows.name:
Captain Nopopon
commanded the entire Cloud Sea...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0047
rows.name:
He's known as the founder
of what would become
the Nopon Trade Guild.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0202
rows.name:
Being the descendant of
such an illustrious figure...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0203
rows.name:
It's hardly surprising
that he established
the Avaritia Trade Guild.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0301
rows.name:
Excellent.
Let's get started!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0048
rows.name: The modern nation of Invidia...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0049
rows.name:
...is governed by six great noble
lines, foremost among them the
Duchy of Selosia.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0050
rows.name:
But long time ago, was governed by
not six noble houses but nine!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0051
rows.name:
Among those nine was Duchy of Envia,
which hold power near equal to
that of Selosia.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0052
rows.name:
But the leader of Envia, a man
named Hannes, died suddenly in
mysterious circumstances...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0053
rows.name:
So eldest son Giani take over Duchy,
but he too soon die of illness.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0054
rows.name:
Next in line was Giani's younger
brother Philip, but he too died of
illness before his twentieth birthday.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0055
rows.name: Thus Duchy of Envia fall from power...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0056
rows.name:
And Duchy of Selosia unite other
noble houses, claiming title of
King of Invidia.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0057
rows.name:
Many mysteries yet remain surrounding
the deaths of the Envian heirs...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0058
rows.name:
Many still suspect foul play from
other noble lines, yes.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0059
rows.name: But the tale does not end there.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0060
rows.name:
Indeed! Prior to sudden death, Hannes,
original leader of Envia, secretly had
child with Gulan woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0061
rows.name:
And it is often claimed that their
descendants live on to this day,
somewhere in Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0062
rows.name: If this theory were to be proven...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0063
rows.name:
It could threaten the very legitimacy
of the current Invidian royal house!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0064
rows.name:
Impressive! You certainly deserve
your reputation as a scholar.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0065
rows.name:
Not at all! Your knowledge
is equally impressive.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0066
rows.name:
Not many people out there
who able to keep up with my
history discussions.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0067
rows.name: Shall we consider this a draw?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0068
rows.name:
Indeed, indeed.
Neither of us could claim
victory over the other.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0069
rows.name:
Sooooo...
Who will be buying book then?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0070
rows.name: ...You can have the book.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0071
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0072
rows.name:
A scholar like you reading it?
The book itself would be honored!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0073
rows.name:
Thank you.
I'll take good care of it.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0074
rows.name:
Next time we meet,
let's have another spirited debate!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0075
rows.name:
Absolutely! I'll make sure to expand
my knowledge base even further by then.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0076
rows.name: So, I'll be purchasing this book now.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0077
rows.name:
Thank you for your purchase!
That'll be 70,000 G, please.

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0078
rows.name:
Wow, that's more
affordable than I expected...

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0079
rows.name: Oh!

rows.label: kizunatalk074_msg0401
rows.name:
...I just realized I don't
have any money on me.
